thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Aixtron Sees EBIT Margin Improving To 5-10 Pct In 2018

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Aixtron Sees EBIT Margin Improving To 5-10 Pct In 2018
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Aixtron:
* SEES 2018 ORDER INTAKE, REVENUES AT 230-260 MILLION EUROS
* SEES 2018 EBIT MARGIN OF 5-10 PERCENT, OPERATING CASH FLOW LOWER BUT STILL POSITIVE
* SAYS APEVA UNIT WORKING ON QUALIFICATION AT MAJOR ASIAN DISPLAY MANUFACTURER
* SAYS IS IN TALKS WITH SEVERAL COMPANIES OVER OLED COOPERATION TO COMPLEMENT APEVA OFFERINGS
* Q4 ORDER INTAKE DOWN 6 PERCENT Q/Q AT 65.7 MILLION EUROS, REVENUES DOWN 13 PERCENT AT 54.1 MILLION
* Q4 EBIT 24.4 MILLION EUROS, NET PROFIT 27.2 MILLION * REUTERS POLL AVERAGE FOR AIXTRON Q4 ORDER INTAKE WAS 60.4 MILLION EUROS, EBIT 21.3 MILLION, NET PROFIT 19.9 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
